oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lon Varnel Job No. 38039
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 2675) for an order placed by Lon Varnel for 100 two color window cards for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show at the Bayfront Arena in St. Petersburg, Florida on April 25, 100 two color window cards for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show at the Municipal Auditorium in Mobile, Alabama on April 26, 200 two color window cards for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show at Roberts Stadium in Evansville, Indiana on April 28, 200 two color window cards for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show at the S. M. U. Stadium in Dallas, Texas on April 29, 200 two color window cards for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show at Assembly Center in Tulsa, Oklahoma on April 30; 15,000 one color heralds for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show and 100 one color jumbos (three sheets) for a performance of the Lawrence Welk Show. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
